title: PWR Bikes SuperBolt is an e-Balance Bike… for training, of course
content:
If your kid has mastered a non-powered balance bike, PWR Bikes says their motorized SuperBolt will take their handling to the next level. And, honestly, it’s kinda hard to argue with that logic. After all, many of the best mountain bikers also hone their high speed skills on motos, so, why not get them started

The post PWR Bikes SuperBolt is an e-Balance Bike… for training, of course appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
